hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Huge Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Near Four Armos Chest

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Saria).text: Did you know that Barinade, Volvagia and Twinrova hard require the Boomerang, Megaton Hammer and Mirror Shield, respectively?

ZR (Near Domain).text: That's a nice wall you got there. Would be a shame if I just... clipped right through that.
